mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.file_name AS "fileName", a.file_size AS "fileSize", a.file_type AS "fileType", a.folder_path AS "folderPath"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_ba_file a
a.del_flag = '1'
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_ba_file( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, file_name, file_size, file_type, folder_path ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{fileName}, #{fileSize}, #{fileType}, #{folderPath} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_ba_att SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, file_name = #{fileName}, file_size = #{fileSize}, file_type = #{fileType}, folder_path = #{folderPath} WHERE id = #{id}
